```{r Set Up, include = FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
source("header.R")
library(geosphere)
```

```{r Read Data}

df <- read_csv("data/raw/census/usa_00008.csv.gz")

hex <- st_read("data/intermediate/homicide_hexagons/survivorship")%>% 
  mutate(year = as.integer(year))


US_tract_1920 <- st_read("data/raw/census/1920/US_tract_1920") %>% 
  filter(NHGISCTY == "0310")

US_tract_1920 <- st_transform(US_tract_1920, st_crs(hex)) 


st_crs(US_tract_1920)

```


```{r}



ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data = US_tract_1920, color = "black") 

```
